65.93.text: It's one of those things that's been around for 100's of years,

68.96.text:
it shouldn't be left to die. It should be carried on
and carried on a passed on through the ages.

72.46.text: The younger age get involved and enjoy it. I've only been shooting myself

75.77.text: for nearly two years, I've haven't looked back since.

81.15.text:
It's the atmosphere, it's the
country sport.

83.67.text: it's the enjoyment of it, it's the fitness as well.

87.54.text: You walk a good couple of miles in a day.

105.68.text: I'm beating here today with my dog Molly.

110.12.text: We're basically running the beating line today and hopefully

113.54.text: get a few birds for the guns.

119.53.text:
Basically, what we do is try and scare as
many birds forwards as possible

123.05.text: to put them over the guns, so the guns have a decent shot.

126.46.text: Many years ago I was introduced to shooting

128.78.text: by my father, who was also a keen shot.

134.30.text:
I shot around here, in
these parts

136.50.text: for the best part of 35-40 years.

139.72.text: It's a nice ground, we get some really decent birds,

145.05.text:
some quick birds, we've got great
terrain,

149.78.text: We got some cracking birds that go over the guns really high.

157.26.text: Quality birds you'd expect to pay a lot of money elsewhere,

160.20.text: we've got them right here in Staffordshire.

165.45.text: I quite  enjoyed myself in the boat earlier on,

I think that Steve may have taken the
plugs out of the boat because

172.31.text: I'm absolutely sure it was sinking.

175.70.text: But I had a few good sporting birds, but although trying to get on the bird

179.96.text: when you have the waves, motion of the waves, it is a little bit difficult,

182.38.text: but it's a skill I'm going to master for next season.

186.92.text: So far everybody seems to have really enjoyed

188.45.text:
themselves. Even the people that don't know
each other, have made good friends and

192.21.text: yeah it's been a very successful day.

199.13.text: From time to time I also come beating,

202.91.text: you can't really see the sheer volume of actively that goes on

207.64.text: behind-the-scenes, but we've got a fair army of beaters,

211.42.text: who come to beat here at Wolseley Park, the same as every shooter in the UK.

215.70.text: They come from all different backgrounds, all different ways of life,

218.52.text: exactly the same as the guys shooting at the front here,

221.54.text: they come for a great day out, great day in the country, come to enjoy themselves.

225.28.text: And spend time with like minded people.

227.62.text: So, regardless of what happens on the day,

it just can't happen without the guys
make it happen, the keeper

have worked exceptionally hard today, they've tried
